alert.note: Alert for Bullitt; Hardin; Meade; Nelson (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 02 at 2:54PM EDT until July 02 at 3:45PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Louisville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Nelson County in central Kentucky... Southeastern Meade County in central Kentucky... Northeastern Hardin County in central Kentucky... Bullitt County in central Kentucky... * Until 345 PM EDT. * At 254 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 13 miles northwest of Elizabethtown, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Shepherdsville, Radcliff, Mount Washington, Vine Grove, Lebanon Junction, Hebron Estates, Fox Chase, Bardstown Junction, Hobbs and Long View. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
